name: Just Let Me Work!
description:
All you want to do is get your work done and leave for the day, but your co-workers won't leave you alone! Try to avoid their distracting messages while getting your work done!

A game completed in one weekend for TriJam #210

How to Play:

Complete your work (type the falling words) before they're due (reach the bottom of the screen), all while dodging your annoying co-workers. Close out the chat windows to keep your sanity and survive as long as possible! If you fail to complete your work (word reaches the bottom of the screen) you'll be written up. Get 3 strikes and you're done!

Credits:

  • Programing: fuzzylimes
  • Art: BridgetteBee
  • Audio Assets:
    • Music: https://tallbeard.itch.io/music-loop-bundle
    • Sound Effects: https://ellr.itch.io/universal-ui-soundpack
    • Sound Effects: https://jdwasabi.itch.io/8-bit-16-bit-sound-effects-pack

Updates:

  • 03/12/2023 3PM EST: fixed a bug where the difficulty wasn't being reset
  • 03/12/2023 3:15PM EST: fixed a bug where popups would spawn in unreachable areas
